item.title: Holy Mass for 4th Sunday of Lent
item.description: Monsignor Eugene Morris livestreamed his private Mass for the fourth Sunday in Lent today. The Mass is preceded by the Most Holy Rosary of the Blessed Virgin Mary. Monsignor’s wonderful homily is worth sharing with everyone you know. I apologize that I did not see this earlier. You will see why I fell in love with the Oratory of Ss. Gregory and Augustine. You can Like their Facebook page to keep track of future livestreamed Masses here.

item.title: Im Not Good Enough for the New Church
item.description: Call me “rigid.” Last night, I saw a tweet that broke my heart. A woman wrote that her husband told her he was going to Mass after work. But he went to a bar, instead. She went to the bar. He was there. He was drunk. She asked for our prayers. I said one for her, and two for her husband. The woman is a traditional Catholic, like me. Or what the Holy Father calls “rigid.
